name: GoodPlay Media
tag_list: golf, charity, charities, golfers, tee-times, tee-time, discount, green-fee
overview:
About Us

GoodPlay Media LLC, a San Francisco Bay Area based company and creator of TeeTimes4Charity.com, is dedicated to supporting local communities and global initiatives by leveraging multimedia technology to foster charitable giving for nonprofit organizations and their respective causes.

TeeTimes4Charity.com effectively links nonprofit organizations with golfers, golf courses, donors and businesses by leveraging high growth media technologies, including the Internet, mobile messaging, social media and interactive video to deliver innovative solutions â€“ for mutual benefit and all for a good cause.

Golfers can reserve tee times, at over 2,300 golf courses nationwide, at highly discounted green fee rates AND make donations to their favorite charitable causes AND invite their friends to donate too.

TeeTimes4Charity.com integrates processing and reporting solutions from highly respected industry partners to deliver timely, accurate, secure and reliable end-to-end online donation solutions.

Golf Channel Solutions â€“ provides secure access to tee time reservations. GuideStar- provides trusted online nonprofit verification status. JustGive â€“ provides trusted and timely processing of donations and tax reporting email receipts to the donor

U.S.Merchant Systems & NetDeposit â€“ provides encrypted and secure online credit card processing

For more information, email: info@teetimes4charity.com; or call: (877) 367-5350.
